normalised: What are some effective scholarship portals for Indian students looking to study abroad? (Education Technology)

unnormalised: **What are some effective scholarship portals for Indian students looking to study abroad? (Education Technology)**
normalised: Scholarship portals are a boon for Indian students dreaming of international education. Navigating the vast landscape of scholarships can be daunting, but technology offers effective solutions.

unnormalised: Scholarship portals are a boon for Indian students dreaming of international education. Navigating the vast landscape of scholarships can be daunting, but technology offers effective solutions.
normalised: Several platforms stand out. Firstly, there are aggregate sites like Scholarship dot com and Fastweb, offering extensive databases but require diligent filtering. For India-specific scholarships, keep an eye on the websites of major educational institutions like I I T Delhi and I I M Ahmedabad. They often have partnerships with foreign universities and offer merit-based scholarships.

normalised: Going by my own experience, remember to be very specific with your search terms. Targeting scholarships based on your field of study (for example, "A I scholarships for Masters students"), your caste (S C slash S T slash O B C scholarships sometimes exist), or even your state (like Maharashtra state scholarships) will yield better results.

normalised: Don't overlook university-specific scholarships. Check the financial aid sections of the websites of universities you are targeting. Many U S and U K universities offer generous scholarships to international students based on academic performance or financial need.
